RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 88. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE APRIL 26, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Al lowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KATE'S GOLDEN DUDE set a pressured pace on the inside, made a bid by the quarter pole and drew off in the stretch to prove much the best under left handed crop urging, sharp. APACHE was settled back early, came five wide into the lane and had a late rally to get up for the place award. NICK THE CARDSHARK was settled early, three wide on the turn and had a mild late kick and just missed the place award. AGGRANDIZE stalked the winner and made a three wide bid on the turn but weakened in the drive. ANNAMATED MOON was allowed to settle early and saved ground on the turn and advanced but lacked a late rally. FLAT OUT FLASHY failed to respond. SPIKES SHIRL pressed the pace two wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Kate's Golden Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, bid 1/4, drew off stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Spikes Shirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Annamated Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable Jackson Stephen G and Jackson Debbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Aggrandize
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide turn, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Apache
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came 5 wide upper stretch, late rally, got 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Nick the Cardshark
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, mild kick, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Out Flashy
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSE VALLEY rushed up the inside to be close up by the half mile marker, then made a inside bid on the turn to take command by the quarter pole, then drew off in the lane to prove best under right handed crop urging. WARRIOR'S MISS pressed the early pace three wide, then fell of the pace on the turn, ran on to be clearly second best, no match for the winner. FAIRVIEW chased the pace four wide, then was five wide on the turn and came widest into the lane and was best of the rest. LUCKY BREEZE was close up early between rivals, then dropped to the inside on the turn and weakened. WIN FOR LAILA was bumped at the start, chased the early pace, made a four wide run on the turn and weakened. CEREAL I D was allowed to settle early, inside on the turn and lacked a rally. DISCREETLIN JONES set a pressured pace two wide and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up inside, bid inside turn, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Discreetlin Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, faltered stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up between horses, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Win for Laila
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 4 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior's Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Cereal I D
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fairview
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, 5 wide turn, came wide, bested rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TILTED TIARA was rated along the inside, steadied by the quarter pole, shifted out three wide leaving the turn and closed well to get up in time under a drive. PLATINUM PROMISE tracked the early pace and made a two wide bid to be clear by the quarter pole, then remained clear by the furlong marker but was denied on the wire to just miss. BLIND SIGHT was outrun early, came three wide into the lane and had a belated rally on the inside to be up for the show award. UNION RALLY chased the pace three wide and came four wide into the lane and had no rally. SHANIA SEA set a fast pace early while clear and then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Blind Sight
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, came 3 wide, belatedly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Tilted Tiara
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, steadied 1/4, shift 3 wide, closed, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Promise
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, bid 2 wide, drew clear 1/4, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Shania Sea
ENTRY.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: set fast pace, clear early, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Union Rally
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming P rice $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FED CHAIR set a pressured pace on the inside, then shook clear on the turn, then dug in gamely in the drive and held sway late to prove best, drving. MR BOLDACIOUS pressed the early pace three wide, then m made a two wide bid off the turn and ran on but it proved to be not enough. FORECLOSURE was bumped at the start, rated along the inside, angled out three wide leaving the turn, then shifted back in by the sixteenth marker and a mild late rally to get the nod for the show award. SWEEPIN HARD was reserved early, then had a belated rally on the inside and just missed the show award. BLUEBERRY MASH was allowed to settle early on the inside, shifted out and came five wide into the lane and had a mild late kick but needed more. COUSIN BOB tracked the pace three wide, came four wide into the lane and weakened the final furlong. PRATT was settled three wide and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweepin Hard
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, saved ground, belatedly inside, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Fed Chair
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, shook clear turn, dug in late, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Blueberry Mash
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Haire Maria Montez
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, shifted out, came 5 wide, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cousin Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, came 4 wide, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Foreclosure
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rated inside, angled out 3 wide, mild rally,got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Boldacious
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3 wide, bid 2 wide, ran on, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Pratt
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide backstretch, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EGOT A POKER FACE was well rated early on the inside, made a two wide bid on the turn and took over leaving the turn and was clear by the furlong marker, then out kicked FOLE'S NOTION to the wire to maintain a safe margin, drving. FOLE'S NOTION was settled back early, commenced a two wide move on the turn and shifted out and came four wide into the lane to make a bid, but was outfinished to the wire, second best. OUR MARK STEVEN stalked the pace three wide and came four wide into the lane and weakened in the drive, bested rest. OVER AND THUNDER set the pace on the inside and was headed leaving the turn and weakened in the drive. TUCKERTON BAY was reserved early, made a four wide rin on the far turn and came widest into the lane and lacked a rally. TURNS was three wide into the first turn, settled two wide early, then saved ground on the far turn and weakened. UNCLE YUDI was settled back early and five wide on the backstretch and failed to respond. STRAWBERRY TREAT was settled early on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Fole's Notion
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, advanced 2 wide turn, came 4 wide, bid, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tuckerton Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide run turn, came widest, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Strawberry Treat
ENTRY.OWNER: Z and Z Stables and Barrett Judith M
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Over and Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed upper stretch, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Yudi
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, 5 wide backstretch, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Egot a Poker Face
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, bid 2 wide turn, clear 1/8, kept safe late,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Horseshoe Valley Equine Center LLC & Best Foot Forward, LL

ENTRY.NAME: Our Mark Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, came 4 wide, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Turns
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, settled 2 wide, inside turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOUND BY TRUTH was reluctant to load, away alertly to set the early pace, drew off on the turn, then widened the margin off the turn and was kept to task to prove much the best. LOVELY MELAYRA was allowed to settle early, shifted out on the turn and made a five wide run by the quarter pole, came widest into the lane and rallied well while being bumped late, second best. FUELED UP tracked the early pace in between rivals, three wide run on the turn and came four wide into the lane, then drifted out in the lane late and bumped a rival while loosing the place award late. HOPEFULLY ICU tracked the pace on the in side and weaklened. LOIS'S CAUSE tracked the early pace four wide and remained four wide on the turn and weakened. BO RUNKLE chased the pace in between rivals and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Melayra
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 5 wide 1/4 pole, came wide, bumped late, rally

ENTRY.NAME: Hopefully Icu
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Fueled Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, 3 wide turn, lost 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Bo Runkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bound by Truth
ENTRY.OWNER: Stites Christine S and Stites Tracy
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, away alertly, set pace, drew off turn, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Lois's Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, chased 4 wide turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYSTIC POINT was rated outside early, made a four wide move on the turn and came five wide into the lane, continued that move and edged clear late to prove best, driving. DIXIE CANNONBALL stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to gain a short advantage, then shook clear off the turn but could not hold off the winner, second best. KEEPING IT COUNTRY was well placed early on the inside, boxed by the quarter pole, shifted out and came three wide into the lane, then finished willingly to be clearly best of the rest. TIZ HANDSOME pressed the pace two wide, made as bid between rivals on the turn and faded in the drive. BOX OF JOE chased the early pace and lacked the needed rally. DREAMERS REWARD set a pressured pace on the inside and weakened in the drive. CALLYOURIGHTBACK chased the pace three wide and stopped. BUSTER BRUNO failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping It Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, boxed 1/4, shift 3 wide upper, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Box of Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, needed rally

ENTRY.NAME: Callyourightback
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamers Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Handsome
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, bid between horses turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Buster Bruno
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Cannonball
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide turn, led 1/4, caught, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated outside, 4 wide move turn, came 5 wide, edged clear late
